org.flixel.FlxRect

type
class
subclasses
org.flixel.system.FlxQuadTree
Stores a rectangle.

Constructor

public new(?X : Float, ?Y : Float, ?Width : Float, ?Height : Float)
Instantiate a new rectangle.
Parameters:
X - The X-coordinate of the point in space.
Y - The Y-coordinate of the point in space.
Width - Desired width of the rectangle.
Height - Desired height of the rectangle.

Instance Variables

public bottom(getBottom,null) : Float

public height : Float

public left(getLeft,null) : Float

public right(getRight,null) : Float

public top(getTop,null) : Float

public width : Float

public x : Float

public y : Float

Instance Methods

public copyFrom(Rect : FlxRect) : FlxRect

Helper function, just copies the values from the specified rectangle.
Parameters:
Rect - Any FlxRect.
Returns:
A reference to itself.

public copyFromFlash(FlashRect : nme.geom.Rectangle) : FlxRect

Helper function, just copies the values from the specified Flash rectangle.
Parameters:
FlashRect - Any Rectangle.
Returns:
A reference to itself.

public copyTo(Rect : FlxRect) : FlxRect

Helper function, just copies the values from this rectangle to the specified rectangle.
Parameters:
Point - Any FlxRect.
Returns:
A reference to the altered rectangle parameter.

public copyToFlash(FlashRect : nme.geom.Rectangle) : nme.geom.Rectangle

Helper function, just copies the values from this rectangle to the specified Flash rectangle.
Parameters:
Point - Any Rectangle.
Returns:
A reference to the altered rectangle parameter.

public getBottom() : Float

The Y coordinate of the bottom of the rectangle. Read-only.

public getLeft() : Float

The X coordinate of the left side of the rectangle. Read-only.

public getRight() : Float

The X coordinate of the right side of the rectangle. Read-only.

public getTop() : Float

The Y coordinate of the top of the rectangle. Read-only.

public make(?X : Float, ?Y : Float, ?Width : Float, ?Height : Float) : FlxRect

Instantiate a new rectangle.
Parameters:
X - The X-coordinate of the point in space.
Y - The Y-coordinate of the point in space.
Width - Desired width of the rectangle.
Height - Desired height of the rectangle.
Returns:
A reference to itself.

public overlaps(Rect : FlxRect) : Bool

Checks to see if some FlxRect object overlaps this FlxRect object.
Parameters:
Rect - The rectangle being tested.
Returns:
Whether or not the two rectangles overlap.
